structure.unit: Executive And Administrative Officers Of The Commonwealth

law.catch_line: Registration Of Labor Organization Seeking To Represent Employees Of Gaming Establishment; Financial Interest Of Labor Organization Or Its Officers In Gaming Establishment
law.text: [ Text of section added by 2011, 194, Sec. 16 effective November 22, 2011.] (a) Each labor organization, union or affiliate seeking to represent employees who are employed at a gaming establishment shall register with the commission. (b) Neither a labor organization, nor its officers who are not otherwise licensed or registered under this chapter, may hold any financial interest in a gaming establishment whose employees are represented by the organization.
